blurb.en: Alive! Rapid Hair-Growth Serum is a vegan, all-natural product that helps to stimulate thicker, fuller, younger-looking hair.

children.text: Alive! Rapid Hair-Growth Serum is a vegan, all-natural product that helps to stimulate thicker, fuller, younger-looking hair. The serum nourishes the scalp with vital nutrients, encouraging healthy hair growth. Applied directly to the scalp, the serum penetrates deep into the skin to deliver its powerful blend of vitamins and minerals. With regular use, you will see a noticeable difference in the thickness and fullness of your hair.

Alive! is a leave-in serum that helps to nurture and heal the follicles and scalp, and stimulate healthy hair growth. Apply 1 to 3 times daily in the morning after shampooing and towel-drying hair and/or before bedtime to scalp each day for best results. This powerful little serum helps to unblock and clear the sebum, and stimulate natural circulatory processes to expedite new hair growth.
